com.github.iamniklas.colorspaces

Class ColorRGB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.iamniklas.colorspaces.ColorRGB

  • public class ColorRGB
extends java.lang.Object
    The ColorRGB class represents a color with red, green, and blue components. It provides methods for color manipulation and conversion to other color spaces.

        public ColorRGB(int _r,
                int _g,
                int _b)
        Constructs a ColorRGB object with the specified red, green, and blue values.
        Parameters:
        _r - the red component (0-255)
        _g - the green component (0-255)
        _b - the blue component (0-255)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any component is out of range (0-255)

      • dim

        public ColorRGB dim(float _r,
                    float _g,
                    float _b)
        Dims the color by the specified percentages for each channel.
        Parameters:
        _r - the percentage to dim the red channel (0.0-100.0)
        _g - the percentage to dim the green channel (0.0-100.0)
        _b - the percentage to dim the blue channel (0.0-100.0)
        Returns:
        a new ColorRGB object with the dimmed color
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any percentage is out of range (0.0-100.0)
